author: Bellular News
description:
I checked in with the Total War community expecting a quiet year of rebuilding. That is not what I found.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 Total War!
01:00 History Repeats
01:59 Faction Friction

05:47 Taking Responsibility
07:30 Spinning Plates
09:37 Unstable Foundations
12:08 The State Of Total War
